description:
'''Ratbot''' is a [[future soul]] band from [[Mexico City]] formed in 2011. They have released three EPs featuring a sound influenced by [[R&B]], [[Hip Hop music|hip hop]], [[House music|house]], and various [[electronic music|electronic]] genres.

In 2013, the band recorded at Converse Rubber Tracks Studios in Mexico City and they were also part of Converse Rubber Tracks Live playing with [[Phantogram (band)|Phantogram]] and local bands Acidandali and [[Rey Pila]].

In 2014 Ratbot played at Festival Marvin  and Carnaval de Bahidor√°.
